original_text: The Jewish leaders made Peter and John stand in front of them. They began to ask them questions. They said, ‘How did you cause that man's legs to become strong? Who gave you the power and the authority to do it?’
korean_text: 사도들을 가운데 세우고 묻되 너희가 무슨 권세와 누구의 이름으로 이 일을 행하였느냐

sentences.original_text: The Jewish leaders made Peter and John
They began to ask them questions
How did you cause that man's legs to become strong
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 어떻게 그 사람의 다리를 강하게 만들었는가

sentences.original_text: and the authority to do it
